title: Kristen Lee & Kyle Cheromcha - TheDRIVE.com
description:
Kristen Lee and Kyle Cheromcha work at TheDrive.com, which covers automotive news, reviews, motorsports, and culture. Kyle is the Editor-in-Chief and Kristen is the Deputy Editor. We talk about their drive in the new Bentley Continental GT Speed, Kyle's commutes in his old Chevy Blazer, the pros/cons of motorcycles, rentable death traps, whether or not you should keep a car forever, what French hatchbacks have that U.S. cars don't, and more. 

@kristenleeeeeeee 

@kylecheromcha 

Buy Innova tools at all major automotive retailers, Amazon, and https://www.Innova.com 

Go to https://www.blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dashcam. Free shipping for orders over $200. 

This show was recorded on 9/27/2021. Don't want to wait days or weeks for episodes to publish on Tuesday/Thursday? Sign up to be a Pro Driver patron! We upload both the audio and video versions as soon as the live stream ends. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast 

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire 

 

Want shorter podcasts? Subscribe to our new CLIPS channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD4WGV-W5zD1MK4yHbNGwmw
